intro: Laugeria tubulosa, commonly known as the tubular laugeria, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Rubiaceae. It is characterized by its slender, tubular flowers that typically range in color from white to pale pink. The plant features opposite, simple leaves that are usually ovate to elliptical in shape. It is native to tropical regions of Africa and thrives in moist, shaded environments. Laugeria tubulosa is often found in forest understories and is valued for its ornamental appeal.
